channel.title: Need help with my rsps people cant login getting *error connection *
channel.description:
hee there,
i got a rsps server i did everything right this is my server https://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=82.173.157.41 but there is 1 problem . when people run the client it says error connection when they try to login how i can fix it * so people cant login * need help.

item.title: Need help with my rsps people cant login getting *error connection *
item.dc:creator: @leader317 leader317
item.description:
@leader317 wrote:

i did that , but it aint working

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my rsps people cant login getting *error connection *
item.dc:creator: @Retaliate Retaliate
item.description:
@Retaliate wrote:

Did you send them the right client that has the IP switched to the IP that you are using to host?

Might want to double check. Go into your client.java and switch the 127.0.0.1 to your hosted IP that they will connect to.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my rsps people cant login getting *error connection *
